original_title: 人妻晒し　表の顔は貞淑妻、裏の顔は変態妻の公開記録―。
overview: Do you know "exposure"? The daily appearance of the beloved wife, nakedness, and even the couple's activities are secretly filmed, published on the net, and made into viewers' "onapetto". I became addicted to such a site, and I came to want to expose my beloved wife, Iori, who is kind and brave and loved by her parents. I voyeured and posted changing clothes, bathing, and shell underwear. And I was pleased with the increasing number of comments about her wife, and I began to want to expose her wife's more perverted appearance.
title: Exposed Record Of A Married Woman: She Makes It Seem Like She Is A Chaste Wife, But In Secret She Turns Into A Slut Wife. Iori Nanase
